a0277b6d-5946-4431-8760-f42eced88654.name: Combat Reflexes
a0277b6d-5946-4431-8760-f42eced88654.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

113e04d7-5466-4da6-a775-4734d6d98426.name: Off-Hand Weapon Training (@Weapon@)
113e04d7-5466-4da6-a775-4734d6d98426.notes: Replaces equal-named technique on p. B232

088a884f-e827-4b28-8942-269eb7c85c14.name: Weapon Bond
088a884f-e827-4b28-8942-269eb7c85c14.notes: You own a Weapon that is uniquely suited to you.

98a94429-a729-4a65-9400-f08a070ab30d.notes: Usable once per 30 minutes of play

c6e0e376-2ea6-4ba6-96c2-9f45d75873bd.name: Intolerance (@Rival nation or other large group@)

31828128-8a3c-467b-a59f-f0e4162586db.name: Social Stigma (Criminal Record)
31828128-8a3c-467b-a59f-f0e4162586db.notes: -1 Reaction, -2 for cops & judges. Precludes Honesty.

db2200ce-4819-428c-9e5c-b97c53631482.name: Choose four
db2200ce-4819-428c-9e5c-b97c53631482.notes: Or choose three, and raise one of them, or a combat skill, by one level.

c22d71d0-68fa-4619-800a-041f8c16baab.name: Choose four
c22d71d0-68fa-4619-800a-041f8c16baab.notes: Or choose three, and raise one of them, or a combat skill, by one level.

c795efdb-b97e-4752-bd0e-b3b3deadfa6e.name: Judo
c795efdb-b97e-4752-bd0e-b3b3deadfa6e.notes: Allows parrying two different attacks per turn, one with each hand.

c412d64f-6e66-4ffc-96ee-5fd4f0404b7b.name: Choose 18 points
c412d64f-6e66-4ffc-96ee-5fd4f0404b7b.notes: Either two or six points may be used to level-up one of these skills.

9bd0ceea-6596-4bb0-9d98-ea200808dfe0.notes: Choose 20 points. Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.

463a6bf8-800c-4de6-8607-2b75ca3ea070.notes: Either two or six of those points may be used to increase one of these skills by one or two levels.

327b5604-feec-49dd-9f04-4a6c96f756da.notes: Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.
